clientId.title: Client ID
clientId.description: Application (client) ID from Azure Active Directory

clientSecret.title: Client Secret
clientSecret.description: Application (client) secret from Azure Active Directory

tenantId.title: Tenant ID
tenantId.description: Directory (tenant) ID from Azure Active Directory

driveId.title: Drive ID
driveId.description: SharePoint drive ID. If not provided, default document library will be used

directoryFilterPattern.title: Default Directory Filter Pattern
directoryFilterPattern.description: Regex to only include/exclude directories that matches the pattern.

fileFilterPattern.title: Default File Filter Pattern
fileFilterPattern.description: Regex to only include/exclude files that matches the pattern.

spreadsheetFilterPattern.title: Default Spreadsheet Filter Pattern
spreadsheetFilterPattern.description: Regex to only include/exclude spreadsheets that matches the pattern.

worksheetFilterPattern.title: Default Worksheet Filter Pattern
worksheetFilterPattern.description: Regex to only include/exclude worksheets that matches the pattern.
